mainTask: Write an article on benefits of meditation

agents.agentName: Agent for Research the benefits of meditation (physical, mental, emotional)
agents.taskAssigned: Research the benefits of meditation (physical, mental, emotional)

agents.agentName: Agent for Find supporting evidence and credible sources
agents.taskAssigned: Find supporting evidence and credible sources

agents.agentName: Agent for Outline the article structure (introduction, body paragraphs, conclusion)
agents.taskAssigned: Outline the article structure (introduction, body paragraphs, conclusion)

agents.agentName: Agent for Write the introduction (hook, background, thesis statement)
agents.taskAssigned: Write the introduction (hook, background, thesis statement)

agents.agentName: Agent for Write body paragraphs (each focusing on a specific benefit, with evidence)
agents.taskAssigned: Write body paragraphs (each focusing on a specific benefit, with evidence)

agents.agentName: Agent for Write the conclusion (summary of benefits, call to action)
agents.taskAssigned: Write the conclusion (summary of benefits, call to action)

agents.agentName: Agent for Edit and proofread the article for grammar, spelling, and clarity
agents.taskAssigned: Edit and proofread the article for grammar, spelling, and clarity

agents.agentName: Agent for Create a compelling title and meta description
agents.taskAssigned: Create a compelling title and meta description

agents.agentName: Agent for Format the article for readability (headings, subheadings, bullet points)
agents.taskAssigned: Format the article for readability (headings, subheadings, bullet points)

agents.agentName: Agent for Review and finalize the article
